commit message:
Version 2.0.1 update

Android 5.0 support; Backup improvement; Back/Home pressed in
EditActivity now checks for changes; Minor fixes and optimisation.

Merge pull request #3 from RyDroid/minor-java

Minor Java changes

Merge pull request #1 from RyDroid/fr

French translation

Merge pull request #4 from svetlemodry/master

Czech translation

Merge pull request #5 from AltNico/master

German translation

Merge pull request #7 from Djiko/master

Fix typos on fr strings

Version 3.0.2 update

Total project and code refactor; New icons and Material Design with
backwards compatibility; Added DataUtils class which takes care of
saving/retrieving data; Replaced option menu with support menu for
Toolbar (onMenuItemClick); Scroll listener to hide new note button;
Changed single deletion to multi-choice delete; Option to hide note
body in list; Added note search; CAB consistent with design; Fixed
AlertDialog window leaks when orientation changed; Added checks for
changed colour/font size/hideBody; Updated code documentation.
Added Travis config file and updated README.md
Added lintOptions to build.gradle to fix Travis build

Czech translation fix
so that the text makes sense

Merge pull request #14 from svetlemodry/master

Czech translation fix

Merge pull request #15 from robin007bond/dutch

Added Dutch translation

Version 3.1.0 update

Added note auto-save; Added new colour picker dialog; newNote button
now hides a bit better and also when search/delete modes are active;
Added ScrollView in activity_edit for note body; Added Romanian
translation; Fixed SearchView bug; Note body now completely hides in
main list; Project code refactor and improvements; Updated README.md
and Travis; Newer build tools and support for API 22.
